DOC.brief_summary: Physical inactivity still major public health problem . Active transportation i.e . walk cycle transport contribute great total physical activity . The specific aim study evaluate 12-week mobile phone application increase time spent active transportation ( cycle walk ) moderate-to-vigorous physical activity Swedish adult age 20-65 year .
DOC.brief_title: The Smart City Active Mobile Phone Intervention ( SCAMPI )
DOC.criteria: 2065 year age living Stockholm suburbs able understand Swedish sufficiently well order understand purpose study content intervention disease prohibit participation moderate physical activity walk cycling
